text: <!channel>: Good morning, team Luxo! Welcome back, <@U02613K0X>. Let's sit down at 10am to check in and make a plan for the next two days. We're almost there!!
<!channel>: Please send me your lunch requests! I'm thinking Bunk, unless someone has a preference for something else! I'll run over there before my noon call.

Luxo install packaging is basically set to completely install Luxo from a base Ubuntu 14.10 install, including the Boost.Numpy and DepthSenseSDK libs as custom packages. There's an install script on Basecamp and in the repo under build/install.sh, so it's a 1-liner for PIT to install and upgrade.
I'll update the Readme.md in there so we have instructions on how to update with our latest code and get it into the package repo
Just realized timer and heat controls sometimes overlap when the timer rotates. Fixing it now and this will hopefully solve some of our false click issues.
